name: initGestureEvent
desc: Initializes a newly created GestureEvent object.
declaration:
void initGestureEvent(
    DOMString type, 
    boolean canBubble, 
    boolean cancelable, 
    DOMWindow? view, 
    long detail, 
    long screenX, 
    long screenY, 
    long clientX, 
    long clientY, 
    boolean ctrlKey, 
    boolean altKey, 
    boolean shiftKey, 
    boolean metaKey, 
    EventTarget? target, 
    float scale, 
    float rotation
);
